name: DEMOTED
description:
Hello employee #63276, 

I have great news but you didn't hear it from me. You're on the verge of receiving a promotion from the big guy up stairs, however there are a few things you must do first...

Now this is going to be very difficult so if you can't handle it then you're out the door.

Yours sincerely,

Mr. Manager

Everything in this was built from the ground up within Unity. No external assets or packages used.
